entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this morning and this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
